title: Workshop on Utilizing Multi-Metric Frameworks for EFL Teacher Classroom Assessment (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational English teaching theories and classroom observation experience
context.additional_context: Practice-centered program for enhancing instructional analysis and evaluation competencies

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five core dimensions of EFL class evaluation: instructional design, material utilization, teaching methodology, class effectiveness, and class management.
Learners can evaluate recorded class materials based on 15 detailed metrics (e.g., pronunciation accuracy, achievement of learning objectives, student engagement).
Learners can structure teachers' strengths/areas for improvement and write feedback reports by applying a multi-metric evaluation framework.
Learners can critically discuss the potential and limitations of digital assessment tools (e.g., AI-based analysis systems).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
